name: Epic Chain
description: â€‹Epic Chain, formerly known as Ethernity Chain, has evolved into a cutting-edge Layer 2 blockchain ecosystem. This transformation enhances scalability, lowers transaction costs, and improves interoperability, driving adoption across Real World Assets (RWAs) and entertainment. Epic Chain provides a robust infrastructure for digital collectibles, tokenized assets, and seamless blockchain integrations, empowering creators and brands. Notable features include EVM compatibility, fast transactions, low gas fees, AI-driven DRM control, a plug-and-play toolkit, and a carbon-neutral network. The EPIC token facilitates staking, trading, and governance within the ecosystem.
